Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: my2girlz2331
Reviews.Content: An all around great stay! I am (as noted in my other reviews) a die hard hotel snob (typically a Hampton girl )but went to this hotel with our softball team over New Years weekend and was pleasantly surprised. It is a remodeled Hampton Inn, extremely clean, great front desk service and a clean, nice hot breakfast. The bathrooms were a bit small but given the fact that they were very clean, the size is no big deal. I highly recommend this hotel and it was great being less than 5 minutes from the SportZone where they were playing. Also super easy access to the freeway.

Reviews.Title: “Good Spot for IMS Activities”
Reviews.Author: cac2582
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here during qualifications weekend for the 2011 Indianapolis 500. It's a clean, quiet, well located and very serviceable Holiday Inn Express and I'll definitely be back. My wife and I very much enjoy Holiday Inn Express. We've found them to be typically more modern and better appointed than your other run of the mill motels and this one is no exception. Free hot breakfast in the morning is also a great touch and is done very competently here. One of the biggest perks for us was the proximity to IMS. Just a ten minute (or less) drive from the Speedway up I-465, this hotel made it very easy to get back and forth. In fact, I believe if we just wanted to take a taxi back and forth that would have worked just as well. Another nice perk was the free wi-fi. We were able to keep up with news from Qualifications and also get the up to date weather. This hotel is also very close to a lot of dining options on the Northwest side of Indy, and isn't far from the North side attractions either. I believe a nice movie theater was near there as well. Anyway...for what it is, it's a great spot and I'll definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Functional”
Reviews.Author: SVG108
Reviews.Content: Fairly functional...nothing fancy. Rooms are compact with smallish bathrooms. He gym has 2 treadmills, 1 stairmaster, 1 cycle and a couple of benches for ab exercises (something not commonly found everywhere). The hotel has daily specials for guests be it wings, nachos, or snacks with free wine or beer. This comes in very handy as there are not any decent restaurants within walking distance from the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Shopping Trip 2011”
Reviews.Author: Rosedale_INLinda
Reviews.Content: Every year around 10 girls go shopping in Indianapolis and Gift and Hobby Show. This year I booked Holiday Inn Express at Northwest Park 100. Once again, I was not disappointed. The hotel was very nice, staff was wonderful, beds & linens were very comfortable and the breakfast was one of the nicest I have experienced in a hotel. If we go to the north side next year, I will most certainly book this hotel again. A+++++ Happy Shoppers!!!

Reviews.Title: “Good value on the west side”
Reviews.Author: hjb4971
Reviews.Content: I stay in this hotel once or twice every month for business but would stay there for family visits or during race weeks too. This is a relatively new, clean, hotel that is conveniently located on the west side of Indy and is a good value for the price.

Reviews.Title: “It's a Holiday Inn Express.”
Reviews.Author: SeenAlot
Reviews.Content: Sometimes you just have to write a review because you have a duty to the community. We stayed here on the way from CLT to CHI. We got it because we Hotwired a hotel and we chose this 'hood over downtown in order to not have to deal with valeting the car or parking charges. But it's a Holiday Inn Express. Aren't they all the same? It was clean. The bed was comfortable. Mostly traveling salesmen and construction workers as guests. Free cheap beer. Sometimes staying in a hotel is just a boring necessity.

Reviews.Title: “Mixed Bag”
Reviews.Author: kscrosby
Reviews.Content: My family and I recently stayed at this Holiday Inn Express. Over-All, we had a good time. Breakfast was nice and the beds were comfortable. My only complaint deals with the AC units in the rooms. Hotel management has set all the AC units with a minimal setting of 66 (the fitness room went lower). Most people would think that is fine, but I like to sleep in cold conditions. I am also a light sleeper, and the AC unit was inconsistently loud and quiet. When the fan was on, it was quiet. When the AC cycled on, it was very loud. I asked the front desk to switch our rooms and they did. The second room was better, but it was still annoying. I had to use earplugs. I've stayed in plenty of similar classed hotels and did not experience the same. If you are a light sleeper who likes cool rooms, this is not your place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Service was great.”
Reviews.Author: legaleagle76_10
Reviews.Content: The service at the Holiday Inn Express was excellent, in fact, some of the best I have ever experienced. The front desk made check-in very, very quick and told us exactly what we needed to know. The room was clean, spacious and well appointed. There were many children staying in the hotel for a semi-state baseball game, but once we closed our door, we heard nothing. The free breakfast in the morning was good as well. Fresh, made-to-order pancakes, sausage, biscuits & gravy, just about everything you could want. Being free made it all the better. Great stay, we will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, helpful staff made our working trip so enjoyable!”
Reviews.Author: Amanda_Richardson12
Reviews.Content: My colleague and I spent 6 weeks on a working trip in Indianapolis. We lived throughout at the Holiday Inn North West. For a longer stay the laundry washing machine and drier was a huge bonus. Rachel Radez on reception was also our extremely attentive host. Always willing to help with recommendations for places to eat, local amenities, outings, directions, basically anything we needed help with...We were really grateful and she helped make our stay in Indianapolis such an enjoyable one! The Holiday Inn should be proud of having such excellent staff. I would wholeheartedly recommend the Holiday Inn Express North West!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay, staff couldn't be better.”
Reviews.Author: Grnbayhusker
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Holiday Inn Express Northwest for a business trip. I chose the hotel partly due to it's close proximity to where I would be during the day, partly due to the shuttle service, and partly due to the reviews. I have to say that I was not disappointed. The staff went out of their way to insure my stay was pleasant and that I received answers to my questions immediately. I felt like they had known me for a long time and treated me like a valued guest. The shuttle service was ready every morning and a quick phone call in the evenings had them there to pick me up within 10 minutes. I also took part in one of the two evening Manager's Receptions that included a light dinner and refreshments. I utilized the fitness room the entire stay, and although it is modest in size with two treadmills, a stair stepper, a stationary bicycle, and a couple of benches for sit-ups and leg exercises, it worked for my needs and I never had to wait for a machine. The pool area was clean, although I did not utilize either the pool or hot tub during my stay. The hallways and rooms were quiet, with just a little of the noise from the adjacent interstate coming in. I was able to sleep comfortably with the heater/fan running. All in all, the hotel is a great place to stay with staff who are clearly dedicated to customer service.

Reviews.Title: “Great rate, service, and room.”
Reviews.Author: Gemantravller
Reviews.Content: We found this hotel by surprise because our car broke down while driving back home, but we managed to get to there parking lot and they came through for us. We were blown away with the nice service we got at 11 pm at night and how nice the room was. Everything very new, clean, and comfy. The breakfast wasn't anything super special but it was nice. The people that work there are very nice!! Understood our problem and tried to help us and made sure we were enjoying our stay. I will stay here again for sure!!

Reviews.Title: “Most continious and courteous management and service I ever experienced”
Reviews.Author: lzedar
Reviews.Content: There was a new manager which I had some reservations about ,I believe her name was Rachel, but as I needed some help she came through for me with help on any request. I will definitely stay there when ever I am in town. I will also recommend the hotel to all of my business associates because they will appreciate the value.

Reviews.Title: “My Second Home....”
Reviews.Author: marcmal
Reviews.Content: As a frequent traveler to the Indianapolis area, I have settled in on my home away from home. There are three main reasons for this. First, the staff. Rachel, Megan, Mathereon, Katie and all of the others are second to none. They are always there to make sure your stay is the best. Their smiles and good people skills always are a delight to see when you walk through the door. Second is the facility itself. It is always clean, quiet and well maintained; and for me the location is perfect for my visits. And finally the value. I stay at this location on a very regular basis so I was able to negotiate a rate that benefits both me and the hotel's profitability. Rachel was great to work with on this and the overall experience has been great. She was able to allow for me to stay at a place that I prefer while allowing for sound value where our companies expenses are taken into consideration.

Reviews.Title: “Recommend the Awards Program”
Reviews.Author: MNTravelBuddy
Reviews.Content: This was the first time I used my awards program and I was amazed how fast the check in process went. It was very nice to receive special treatment. The hotel exceeded my expectation in both cost and class. We took advantage of the amenities including the pool, breakfast and laundry.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place.......but”
Reviews.Author: 67nova
Reviews.Content: Great hotel with up to date and clean rooms, friendly and helpful staff. But, after having car damaged and broken into with items stolen, the lack of security is not where I'll be going back. Thank you Holiday Inn.

Reviews.Title: “treated like family.”
Reviews.Author: shorty085
Reviews.Content: huge beds that were very comfy loved breakfast bar. staff very friendly and haelpful look forward to next stay.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Staff and Clean Hotel”
Reviews.Author: kutezbug
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed here in April. We needed two rooms that where adjoining since we had our two children with us. The front desk went above and beyond to make sure our rooms where connecting and got us directions to the Indianapolis Zoo and Children's Museum. They also made recommedations on resturants in the area. The hotel was very clean and updated. Our rooms where very comfy and spotless. The breakfast was pretty good as well and the breakfast person was very upbeat! Also when we checked in to the hotel the lady at the front desk noticed that we had children and offered them some candy that they had in a trophy at the desk. I was very thrilled by this since most hotels act like you don't have children present and don't realize that they have been sitting in a car for at least a couple of hours. I will come back to this hotel time and time again when we visit Indianapolis. I must also say that Indianapolis is a very beautiful city and you should put it on your to do list!

Reviews.Title: “I Always Try To Stay Here When In Indianapolis”
Reviews.Author: mibus82
Reviews.Content: Have stayed in countless hotels in the Indy area, but this location can't be beat for price, location, and quality. Highly recommend it if traveling with a group. Sales staff is very easy to work with and always do what they can to meet our needs. Place has always been clean, rooms and beds are comfortable. Entire staff is very friendly, helpful, and courteous. Good selection of dining within walking distance.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel, not so great service”
Reviews.Author: rudown4187
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice hotel. Fairly clean, nice furniture, the rooms were cozy. Did not like the fact that this hotel does not have a microwave or a fridge. Ample closet space. Nice bathroom area. Breakfast area was 'cute and cozy', but too crowded. The decor was posh, clean, modern. I was impressed by this hotel's appearance. The location is a little farther from downtown but is near a lot of different restaurants so that is nice. I slept very well. The value was quite typical for a Holiday Inn Express. The service was sub par. I was not very pleased and felt like I was a burden to the staff. I did not ask for anything the entire time with the exception of a receipt. Wake up calls are programmed by you into your phone in the room. The breakfast is self serve and was great. There was ample food with an entire breakfast room of people and the breakfast servant was pleasant. Checking in, they did not put any effort at all into helping me to find my Priority Club number. I was not traveling with a laptop or I would have looked it up myself. Had to call my husband to ask him what it was. When I checked out the next morning, I asked for a receipt for my room. The desk clerk asked me if I received one this morning under my door and I said NO. She acted like I was wasting her time and it was my fault I did not get one with my newspaper. Obviously, if I am asking for a receipt I did not receive one previously. So when I told her I did not receive one, she proceeded to tell me that I had a zero balance bill and that people never asked for a receipt that was cash paid. I told her that I had to turn it in for an expense with my company for reimbursement. That was the only part of my stay that I was unhappy with. Their customer service is not very desirable. Even my reservation was incorrect, luckily I was able to correct this on my own. The hotel is a wonderful product and I was pleased with everything physical with the exception of the lack of fridge/microwave. The customer service needs work, and hopefully this was a fluke.

Reviews.Title: “Good place, more than what I expected”
Reviews.Author: Jabezgreen
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for one night on business, it is a little hard to find from the highway, especially at night. Room was a good size, clean. No problems with staff. I left my cell phone in the room and was unable to collect it until early afternoon and then had it right there at the desk.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, like most of the newly remodeled Expresses.”
Reviews.Author: NoisInNc
Reviews.Content: Excellent rooms, newly furnished. Better than average breakfast. Not close to anything interesting though. Also, in the rooms with two beds, the beds are full size not queen, so if you have two teenagers like us, you will need two rooms, or squeeze into those tiny beds. I've noticed more hotels are doing this.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Friendly, and Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: eibbed0001
Reviews.Content: As a new hotel, I expected the Holiday Inn Express to be nice, and I was not disappointed. The decor and furnishings were nice and the bathroom fixtures were well done and nicer than many upscale hotels. The staff was friendly and polite and the entire hotel seemed well cared for. I would definitely stay there again and recommend it to anyone wishing to stay in that part of Indianapolis.

HotelInfo.Name: Holiday Inn Express Northwest-Park 100
HotelInfo.Address: 7220 Woodland Drive, Indianapolis, IN 46278
